meanings.definition: The act of selling goods or property to the highest bidder.
meanings.sent1: The auctioning of the old paintings brought in a lot of money.
meanings.sent2: I attended the auctioning of rare coins last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The auctioning of the rusty old bike was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in auctioning were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The auctioning of the antique vase was a thrilling experience.

meanings.definition: The process of bidding on items for sale at an auction.
meanings.sent1: Participating in the auctioning can be quite exciting.
meanings.sent2: The auctioning lasted for hours as people bid on various items.
meanings.sent3: The auctioning turned into a fierce competition for the rare book.
meanings.sent4: In the world of auctioning, strategy is key to winning.
meanings.sent5: The auctioning of the vintage car drew a large crowd.
